SEARCH
Package functional.genericKeywords

Class ThreadLocalFunctionalities

java.lang.Object
functional.genericKeywords.ThreadLocalFunctionalities
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericKeywords
public class ThreadLocalFunctionalities extends Object
Provides thread-local functionalities to handle WebDriver instances and other test-related data. This ensures thread safety when running tests in parallel, allowing each thread to have its own instance of the data.

    • getScenarioColumnNumber

      public static int getScenarioColumnNumber(String column)
      Retrieves the column number for a specific column name in the scenario data, specific to the current thread.
      Parameters:
      column - The name of the column.
      Returns:
      The column number for the specified column.

    • getPerformancePort

      protected static int getPerformancePort()
      Retrieves the performance port specific to the current thread.
      Returns:
      The performance port number for the current thread. If the port has not been set for the current thread, this method returns null.
